defaultVendor.name: Dunkin'

menuItem.name: Coffee
menuItem.description: Our famous Hot Coffee is made from high-quality 100% Arabica beans and is freshly ground and brewed continually throughout the day.

menuItem.name: SAUSAGE, EGG & CHEESE
menuItem.description: IT ALL STARTS WITH SAUSAGE A tasty sandwich stacked with egg, American cheese and irresistible sausage

menuItem.name: DONUTS
menuItem.description: Our delicious donuts come in a variety of flavors and are free of artificial dyes, so there’s a favorite for everyone.

menuItem.name: WAKE-UP WRAP®
menuItem.description: UNWRAP PERFECTION Our delicious Wake-Up Wrap® Sandwiches are made-to-order with your choice of protein, egg and cheese. The perfect portion to help start your day or fuel your afternoon.

menuItem.name: BAGELS WITH CREAM CHEESE SPREAD
menuItem.description: A DELICIOUS WAY TO START YOUR DAY A delicious bagel with your favorite cream cheese spread. Enjoy with your favorite morning coffee!

menuItem.name: Tea
menuItem.description: PREMIUM HOT TEAS AND HERBAL INFUSIONS Pyramid style tea sachets containing high-quality loose leaf teas and a unique blend of herbs to offer guests a delicious cup every time.

defaultVendor.description: Dunkin’ Donuts in Paradise Palms Cafe will keep Hawaii running with high-quality beverage offerings–including freshly-brewed Hot and Iced Coffees–paired perfectly with delicious donuts, bakery good, sandwiches and more.

defaultVendor.name: McDonalds

menuItem.name: Big Mac®
menuItem.description: Mouthwatering perfection starts with two 100% pure beef patties and Big Mac® sauce sandwiched between a sesame seed bun. It’s topped off with pickles, crisp shredded lettuce, finely chopped onion and American cheese for a 100% beef burger with a taste like no other. It contains no artificial flavors, preservatives or added colors from artificial sources.* Our pickle contains an artificial preservative, so skip it if you like. There are 550 calories in a Big Mac®. Order one today with

menuItem.name: World Famous Fries®
menuItem.description: McDonald's World Famous Fries® are made with premium potatoes such as the Russet Burbank and the Shepody. With 0g of trans fat per labeled serving, these epic fries are crispy and golden on the outside and fluffy on the inside.

menuItem.name: Chicken McNuggets®
menuItem.description: Our tender, juicy Chicken McNuggets® are made with 100% white meat chicken and no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives.

menuItem.name: Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese
menuItem.description: Quarter Pounder®* with Cheese 520 Cal.520 Cal. Each Quarter Pounder® with Cheese burger features a ¼ lb.* of 100% fresh beef that’s hot, deliciously juicy and cooked when you order. It’s seasoned with just a pinch of salt and pepper, sizzled on a flat iron grill, then topped with slivered onions, tangy pickles and two slices of melty American cheese on a sesame seed bun. Our QPC® contains no artificial flavors, preservatives or added colors from artificial sources. **Our pickle contains an artificial preservative.

menuItem.name: Spicy Crispy Chicken Sandwich
menuItem.description: With our Spicy Pepper Sauce topping the southern style fried chicken fillet on a toasted potato roll, this sandwich was made for those who like it crispy, juicy, tender and hot.

menuItem.name: Sausage Burrito
menuItem.description: The Sausage Burrito is McDonald's Breakfast Burrito and is loaded with fluffy scrambled egg, pork sausage, melty cheese, green chiles and onion! It's wrapped in a soft tortilla, making it the perfect grab and go breakfast.

menuItem.name: Saimin
menuItem.description: Egg noodles in broth with spam and kamaboko

menuItem.name: Iced Coffee
menuItem.description: McCafe Iced Coffee is refreshingly cool and made with 100% Arabica beans, cream and your choice of flavored coffee syrup – caramel, hazelnut, French vanilla and sugar-free French vanilla.

defaultVendor.description: Back in 1954, a man named Ray Kroc discovered a small burger restaurant in California, and wrote the first page of our history. From humble beginnings as a small restaurant, we're proud to have become one of the world's leading food service brands with more than 36,000 restaurants in more than 100 countries.

defaultVendor.description: Da Spot Health Foods & Juices came to light in 2004 by Ahmad Ramadan and Ako Kifuji looking to provide healthy affordable food and at the same time give a diverse and unique outlook on food with dishes from around the world. Da Spot's current goals are to educate sustainability and healthy eating practices

defaultVendor.description: Le Crêpe Café makes traditional French crêpes, cooked to order in front of customers. They specialize in a flavorsome menu of sweet and savory crêpes and use fresh ingredients, organic when possible. Their utensils are even bio-compostable. Enjoy a crêpe any time of day, as a breakfast, snack, main course, or dessert — close your eyes and you’re in Paris!.
